definition: precious darling (often refers to one's child)/sweetheart

sentences.english: Have a both husband and wife the old age son, see as the darling a baby.
sentences.chinese: 有一家夫妻倆老年得子，視爲心肝寶貝。

sentences.english: Our baby is a perfect darling.
sentences.chinese: 這嬰兒是全家的心肝寶貝。

sentences.english: Only a little bright heart. Will you come hold court?
sentences.chinese: 只是一點點，智慧的小心肝兒。你會去開庭吧？

sentences.english: I wanna know. Where is my baby?
sentences.chinese: 我想要知道我的心肝寶貝在哪兒。

sentences.english: And she is the lady. Pretty soul! She durst not lie near this lack- love.
sentences.chinese: 美麗的人兒，她竟然不敢睡近這沒心肝的惡漢。

sentences.english: The little girl was the apple of her daddy's eye.
sentences.chinese: 這小女孩是她爸爸的心肝寶貝。

sentences.english: Please don't cry, sweetheart, you break my heart.
sentences.chinese: 請你別哭，心肝兒，我的心都讓你給哭碎了。

sentences.english: We'll get a lucky break soon, sweetheart.
sentences.chinese: 我們很快就會時來運轉的，心肝兒。

sentences.english: Ponce was as heartless and unfeeling as any wild beast.
sentences.chinese: 幫塞毫無心肝，兇殘猶如野獸。

sentences.english: Does your high-school sweetheart still talk about you?
sentences.chinese: 你高中時期的心肝寶貝還在談論你嗎？

sentences.english: Only a little, bright heart. Will you come hold court?
sentences.chinese: 只是一點點，聰明的小心肝兒。你會去開庭吧？

sentences.english: Clearing away the fire of heart and liver is main treatment.
sentences.chinese: 治療上以清瀉心肝之火爲主。

sentences.english: But, sweetheart, is it my fault that business has been bad lately?
sentences.chinese: 可是，心肝兒，最近生意不景氣是我的錯嗎？

sentences.english: Swallow it if you like, my love.
sentences.chinese: 如果你願意，吞了它吧，我的小心肝。

definition: precious darling (often refers to one's child)/sweetheart
five viscera of TCM, namely: heart 心[xin1], liver 肝[gan1], spleen 脾[pi2], lungs 肺[fei4] and kidneys 腎|肾[shen4]
bottom tip of the heart/fig. innermost feelings/coll. my darling
pit of the stomach/solar plexus/words and thoughts
to jump about/(of the heart) to beat wildly
